column3: Traffic;Phnom Penh: A Traffic Police report shows that in October 2019 there were 294 road accidents nationwide
column4: resulting in 135 deaths and 493 injuries. Compared to September 2019
column5: the number of traffic accidents in October decreased
column6: but the number of injuries increased.------The report said that of the 135 fatalities in October 2019
column7: 100 were motorcycle riders and 76 were not wearing helmets.------In September
column8: a total of 338 road crashes were reported in the country
column9: resulting in 177 deaths and 470 injuries. ------SWIFT NEWS
